name: (s)tone
description:
(S)tone was created for the First monthly Eggplant Show GameJam in February 2021. 
You play as Chromatia as they jump from tone to tone, trying not to fall into the void!

Controls:

Escape = Pause (twice for quit)

MouseClick/GamepadButton = Decrease note volume (also resume)

Mouse/AnalogStick = Select radial note
